item.description:
Wir sind alle eingeladen bei St John's Lutheran Church. Der Pfarrer spricht Deutsch.
He will conduct the service in German with German music by the choir, and hymns to sing auf Deutsch. After the service, you are invited to a reception with German Christmas cookies and other treats baked by the parishioners. They invite all who have a connection with the language. We went last year and it was beautiful. They were very welcoming to our group and thrilled to have us there. The reception was awesome. It's a very special event.
Car park behind the church or on the street.
item.how_to_find_us: It is not a large church. We will be in the back on the right.
item.name: Deutscher Gottesdienst!
